Articles.Content:
Will this happen? It would be great, especially if it has the 'Workshop' option. Also, it could be recommended when the Steam Greenlight gets on line.

What do you all think?
Welcome to the forums and according to a recent interview with the devs they confirmed KSP would be on steam but not when or doing what on steam

This has been bought up a number of times and the thread always deteriorates into a battle of why to and why not to release the game on Steam.

You can easily find the previous threads by doing forum searches with either "steam" or "greenlight" as the keywords.

Just to make it clear though,

KSP will be available on Steam in the near future. How much integration with the API, Workshop or Greenlight there will be is still to be decided, though.

Also, KSP will remain available through the KSP Store. Going on Steam will just open another method to getting the game.

That's about all the facts we have for now. Just wanted to set the record straight, as there is a lot of speculation going around about this, and speculation will turn into misinformation very easily.

Cheers
